english.segment1: What is going on?. Living on this rollercoaster. Up and down, Twisting, turning, brusing, burning.
english.segment2: Speak to me, Tell me all the things I want to hear. Show me all the things I love so dear. So speak.
english.segment3: Here I'm spinning on, Living on this merry-go-round. Off the ground, Crying, flying, nauseating.
english.segment4: And I would take it all again, If it means I get you. I would sing this song again, I'll let you.
